This is an [R Markdown](http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com) Notebook. When you execute code within the notebook, the results appear beneath the code. 

Try executing this chunk by clicking the *Run* button within the chunk or by placing your cursor inside it and pressing *Cmd+Shift+Enter*. 

```{r}
library()
library(arulesSequences)

data <- read_baskets(con = "nasa_data/sessionized_data/msnbc-seqformat-sample.txt", info = c("sequenceID","eventID","SIZE"))

```


```{r}
as(data, "data.frame") # view first few rows of the data
```


```{r}
seqs <- cspade(data, parameter = list(support = 0.1), control = list(verbose = TRUE))
as(seqs,"data.frame")  # view the sequences
```
